name: Rabbit 'n' Money
description:
Controls:

Q = Shoot 

W = Jump

E = Slow-Mo
________________________________________________________________________

  Story:

Once upon a time there was a rabbit, who loved money so much.

One day he realized that all of other animals wants money too!!!

He wanted to be peaceful, but he had only one choice left... get the Desert Eagle

and step in the action and get that money!
